DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective determine effect SOD enzyme frailty health relate quality life among Indonesian pre-frail elderly . The secondary objective determine effect SOD enzyme anti-oxidant status , morbidity , hospitalization among Indonesian pre-frail elderly . The study hypothesis : 1 . SOD enzyme improve frailty status health relate quality life among Indonesian pre-frail elderly . 2 . SOD enzyme increase anti-oxidant serum status among Indonesian pre-frail elderly . 3 . SOD enzyme decrease morbidity among Indonesian pre-frail elderly . 4 . SOD enzyme decrease hospitalization event among Indonesian pre-frail elderly .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect SOD Enzyme Frailty HRQOL Among Indonesian Pre-frail Elderly : A Double Blind Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Study design : randomize double blind placebo control trial . 2 . Location time study : Geriatric Outpatient Clinic Internal Medicine Outpatient Clinic Cipto Mangunkusumo National Hospital Jakarta . Study conduct April 2016 April 2017 . 3 . Study subject : elderly outpatient ( age 60 year old ) pre-frail status , visit clinic medical consultation . 4 . Data sampling : consecutive method . 5 . Sample size : 150 subject ( 75 control group , 75 intervention group ) . 6 . Data collection : demographic data , frailty status , health relate quality life , anthropometric data , anti-oxidant serum status , hospitalization intervention , morbidity , nutritional status , food intake , hand grip strength . 7 . Intervention : SOD+Gliadin capsule dose 250 mg twice day 24 week give intervention group , placebo group give placebo capsule ( amylum ) .
DOC.criteria: Elderly age 60 year prefrail condition Patients SOD enzyme deficiency Willing participate Patients cognitive function impairment ( AMT score < 8 ) Patients depression ( Geriatric depression scale score > = 10 ) Patients history cirrhotic hepatic disease severe hepatic disease Patients kidney function impairment Patients gluten allergy derivative product Patients consume antioxidant omega3 supplement
